job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen en implementeren van innovatieve cloud- en AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building and deploying software solutions, which is a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: toepast om innovatieve generatieve-ai-oplossingen te ontwikkelen en implementeren
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of technologies to develop and implement solutions, which is an integration task. The specific technologies mentioned (GenAI) indicate the domain of the integration.

job_tasks.phrase: geavanceerde cloud- en AI-oplossingen te ontwerpen, te bouwen en implementeren
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the core software engineering tasks of designing, building, and implementing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: het verminderen van de druk op schaarste personeelscapaciteit en het bevorderen van de energietransitie.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business context and strategic goals the role aims to achieve, aligning technical solutions with business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwen en beheren van innovatieve cloud- en AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for building and managing solutions, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van op maat gemaakte oplossingen met behulp van tools zoals Terraform, Python, Azure, en LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of custom solutions using specific tools, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: het beheren en verbeteren van bestaande oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: Managing and improving existing software solutions is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt je verantwoordelijkheid in het ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren van jouw oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes ownership and responsibility for the software development lifecycle (design, build, manage).

soft_skills.phrase: Je denkt mee met het team hoe we het beste onze technieken en tools kunnen inzetten.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates collaborative thinking and contributing to the team's strategy on tool usage, which falls under teamwork and shared decision-making.

profile.rationale: The job tasks are predominantly classified under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration), focusing on building, managing, and implementing cloud and AI solutions. While GenAI technologies (LLMs, RAG) are central to these solutions, the described tasks do not involve deep model development or extensive prompt engineering (Macro-Category B). The role is described as a 'Cloud Engineer' within a 'GenAI Acceleration Team', emphasizing the integration and operationalization of GenAI capabilities within a cloud environment. This aligns with the definition of integrating AI/ML features into a product, where the output is an AI-powered system.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities focused on developing, building, and implementing solutions using GenAI technologies, with the 'Cloud Engineer' title reinforcing the engineering and integration focus. The primary tasks fall under Macro-Category A. While GenAI technologies are mentioned, the depth of involvement in core AI/ML model development or specialization (Macro-Category B) is not explicitly detailed, making 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' the most fitting profile, though a slight ambiguity remains regarding the exact scope of 'developing GenAI solutions'.
